item.description: Some people think meditation is only about stress relief and relaxation. They're wrong. Meditation is about a profound state of peace and joy that carries over into everything you do. After the rebroadcast, we'll have a meditation period, snacks, and time for discussion. It's very informal.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the person up front.
item.why: We're going to play a rebroadcast of an internet talk by Sant Rajinder Singh Ji Maharaj. He talks about how powerful the mind is and how it drags us away from our spiritual goals.

group.name: The Science of Spirituality Meditation Meetup

item.name: Spiritual Meditation -- Food for Your Soul
